name: Behold the Wereturkey
description:
The unusual wereturkey is a lesser known breed of lycanthrope, though not so secretive as to avoid being sighted. They are not solitary creatures, often living in small groups called gobbles. They are considered a threat by some, a nuisance by most.

You and your friends are a gobble of wereturkeys. And the moon is full.

 This is a GMless game that requires a six-sided-die. You can play solo or with friends
